name: wm2
description: Build a JavaScript module for WebApp/2. WM2 implicitly uses HTTP/2 and ES Modules.

scripts.create:server:certificate: cd test/conf; openssl genrsa -out wm2-server.key 2048 && openssl req -new -key wm2-server.key -out wm2-server.csr -subj "/C=JP/ST=Tokyo/L=Tokyo/CN=localhost" && openssl x509 -in wm2-server.csr -days 3650 -req -signkey wm2-server.key > wm2-server.crt
scripts.stop: docker stop app; docker rm app
scripts.test: npm run test:browser && npm run test:node && npm run test:ios && npm run test:el
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:es6 && npm run bundle:es5
scripts.watch: npm run watch:es6 & npm run watch:es5
scripts.unwatch: npm run unwatch:es6; npm run unwatch:es5
